steps.title: Go to https://www.apple.com/itunes/download in a Web browser.
steps.content: Go to https://www.apple.com/itunes/download in a Web browser. If you want to receive updates from Apple, type your email address in the field on the left side of the window.

steps.title: Click Download now.
steps.content: Click Download now . It's a blue button on the left side of the window. The site should automatically detect the type of computer you're using. If it doesn't, scroll down to the bottom of the page and click Get iTunes for Windows or Get iTunes for Mac .

steps.title: Locate the downloaded file on your computer.
steps.content: Locate the downloaded file on your computer.

steps.title: Follow the on-screen instructions to complete the installation.
steps.content: Follow the on-screen instructions to complete the installation. iTunes is now available on your computer.

steps.title: Open the App Store app.
steps.content: Open the App Store app. It's a blue app with a white A in a white circle. The iTunes Store app for iOS is not the same application

steps.title: Tap Search.
steps.content: Tap Search . It's a magnifying glass icon at the bottom (iPhone) or top (iPad) of the screen.

steps.title: Type itunes store in the Search field.
steps.content: Type itunes store in the Search field. It's at the top of the screen.

steps.title: Tap iTunes Store when it appears in the search results.
steps.content: Tap iTunes Store when it appears in the search results.

steps.title: Tap GET.
steps.content: Tap GET . It's to the right of the iTunes Store icon.

steps.title: Tap INSTALL.
steps.content: Tap INSTALL . It appears in the same location as the GET button. The iTunes Store app will be downloaded to one of your iPhone's Home screens.

steps.title: Open the Microsoft Store.
steps.content: Open the Microsoft Store. It is the icon with a picture of a shopping bag and the Microsoft logo. If you're using Windows 10 in S Mode, your system will only support apps available in the Microsoft Store. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Type" "iTunes" in the search box.
steps.content: Type" "iTunes" in the search box. iTunes should also be on the most popular apps list. The app has a music note. Upon clicking on it, it should have Apple Inc as the developer and the words "Apple Music" on top of the background image. You can also go to the direct link here .

steps.title: Click on "Get" or "Install".
steps.content: Click on "Get" or "Install". The app should download automatically.

steps.title: Follow the instructions on the screen to migrate and uninstall iTunes for Desktop.
steps.content: Follow the instructions on the screen to migrate and uninstall iTunes for Desktop. You can only have one app or the other, but not both. Upon installation, you will be able to browse for music, manage your iPhone, and listen to music on your device.
